descript.abstract: Metro Station Entrances - DC only. This dataset contains points representing Metro facilities, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. Station centroids were identified from visual observation of orthophotography and extracted from the planimetric data and a centroid for each entrance was heads-up digitized from the snapbase. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters..
descript.purpose: Metro stations that are located within the District of Columbia.

attracc.attraccr: Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. In process of validation by source and/or responsible agency.

srcinfo.srccontr: base geography for correction to planimetrics

procstep.procdesc: Staff modified the layer to reflect the yellow line extension.

cntorgp.cntorg: Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: Staff edited the attributes of the New York Ave-Florida Ave-Gallaudet U Station.
Metro entrances were compared against the 2005 orthophotography and moved accordingly. This mainly affected the new york avenue station.

cntorgp.cntorg: Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: Entrances and station centroids were identified from visual observation of orthophotography and extracted from the planimetric data and a centroid for each entrance was heads-up digitized from the 1995 orthophotographs. Platform centroids were identified from visual observation of orthophotography and extracted from the planimetric data and a centroid for each entrance was heads-up digitized from the 1995 orthophotographs. Attribute data was provided by the WMATA website. Planimetrics were created at a scale of 1:1,000. This means that a well defined feature falls within two feet of true position. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.

cntorgp.cntorg: D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: added an Anacostia Entrance, Removed a Federal Triangle Entrance, and Remove two Friendship Heights Entrances.
Added yellow and orange line rush plus information.
